readable.title: 1584315962_5b0b45d02d
readable.content: A man holds a flag next to a snowbound campsite . A man with a Texas flag stands in the snow by tents . A person setting up a tent beside a few other tents on the snowy ground . Mountain climbers are setting up their tents . With a pack and ski pole on the ground , a man wearing a winter coat is holding a tent while other tents are already set up .
